name: Jewel Match Aquascapes Collector's Edition
description:
Dive into a wondrous Match-3 undersea world and let the cares of life drift away! Make matches across sprawling coral reef levels, and collect sparkling treasures to restore magnificent maritime mansions to their erstwhile splendor.

Plunge into a spellbinding deep-sea world. Solve mind-bending puzzle challenges with spot the difference scenes and jigsaw puzzles to gather resources. Visit the shop and equip yourself with helpful power-ups as you delve into the fascinating ocean.

Discover tons of new game play elements like submarines, walls, conveyor belts, octopuses, and more! Savor a delightful, relaxing soundtrack while you explore the vast match-3 levels! Your undersea adventure awaits in Jewel Match Aquascapes!

Features
- Explore 220 huge levels!
- 72 additional bonus levels with new game features!
- 3 different play modes: timed, relaxed, and limited moves!
- 3 difficulty settings: normal, advanced and insane.
- Buy dozens of upgrades and power-ups from the shop.
- Replayable mini-games, including jigsaw puzzles and spot the difference scenes.
- Stunning wallpapers.
- Ethereal soundtrack.
